title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, May 11, 2020
description: Today Glacier National Park celebrates its 110th birthday. When founded in 1910, there were at least 150 glaciers in that area of Montana. Today there are only 25.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today Glacier National Park celebrates its 110th birthday. When founded in 1910, there were at least 150 glaciers in that area of Montana. Today there are only 25.
